This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. He's assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and learn about the emir's activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: The Range Busters
programme.desc: In the first of the Range Buster series, a mysterious figure is killing the help at the Circle T Ranch. The Range Busters are called in to help, but cant figure out the murderers identity. Is it Torrence, a longtime rival of the Circle T, or is it blind uncle Rolph? Ray Crash Corrigan, John Dusty King, and Alibi Max Terhune head the cast. Director S. Roy Luby (Border Phantom, Black Market Rustlers), also has a fine list of supporting players, including Luana Walters, Leroy Mason, and Kermit Maynard.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, sent by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In Mysterious Decoy, Pat and Stony get involved with the famous half-way house that settled the Utah-Arizona boundary. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the boys rout out Ole Gimpy's ghost.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a detective who faces the notorious gunslinger Johnny Ringo after finding him responsible for a train robbery. Directed by William Witney. Also starring Mary Castle. Donald Curtis, Emlen Davis, Lee Roberts, Harry Lauter, and Ralph Sanford. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired March 4, 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie make their way to the town of Coffeyville where they run into the Dalton brothers who are seeking to commit a double bank robbery. Also starring Myron healey, Robert Bray and Robert Foulk. Look for future Daniel Boone/Davy Crocket star Fess Parker as a member of the Dalton gang. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, a Texas Ranger is shot down in cold blood. Determined to bring the killer to justice, the Judge and Jeff turn their focus on Curly, but with a lack of evidence the lawmen are patient until they break the case. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Luck O' The Irish
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Roy and Taggart are intrigued by the arrival of Pat O'Hara and his much younger wife Kate. Pat's fondess for drink and gambling has him involved with the town's rowdies who are eying his beautiful bride. The Judge helps sort things out.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A man asserts that he has a Royal Grant that gives him ownership of the entire town.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in November, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A town turns against Eben Cotten as he is accused of selling rifles to the Indians. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe
programme.desc: Roy Rogers gets involved when his buddy finds himself at odds with a rival rodeo operator. There's plenty of singing in this musical western, plus enough action to make you realize that Roy Rogers was much more than a singing cowboy! With a cast that includes Dale Evans, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Lloyd Corrigan, and Tom Keene, director Frank McDonald gives us a fun thrill ride through old Santa Fe. Trigger is here, too!

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Red's aunt, the Duchess, knew Steve's father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywood's fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boone's daughter. There's plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isn't how you die, Boone says. It's what you live for.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Dad Longworth robs a Mexican bank, takes the loot, and leaves his partner Rio to be captured. However, Rio escapes capture and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, it's up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. There's nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and it's all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devil's Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: The Two Gun Man
programme.desc: Ken Maynard stars in this vintage western about ranchers under threat from hired gunmen. Director Phil Rosen, whose career dated back to working with Thomas Edison and included several Charlie Chan features, keeps the action hot with help from a strong ensemble, including Charles King, Murdock MacQuarrie, and a horse named Tarzan! Maynard plays Blackie Weed, a marshall going undercover to capture and arrest some cattle rustlers.He finds himself up against some very bad men, and he's soon framed for murder. Watch as Blackie blazes his way to vindication with a .45 in either hand and the flame of righteous anger in his eyes... Kitty: Nita Martin. Joe Kearney: Lafe McKee. Lem Tolliver: Tom...

programme.title: Red Ryder: Roll, Thunder, Roll!
programme.desc: Red Ryder finds two silver conchas, the trademark of bandit El Conejo, at a raided ranch. He reports the raid to Marshal Bill Faugh but tells him that he suspects that El Conejo, a Robin Hood type character, is being framed.

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN' FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what you'll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. There's some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywood's all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-'em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of television's top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are sent to Oklahoma to investigate a hanging judge. Stoney's plan to go undercover backfires when he is framed for murder himself. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are assigned to investigate reports of an impostor posing as a U.S. Secret Service agent operating in Washington territory. In the guise of a government law officer, the man is shutting down all rivals of a saloon keeper's operating a crooked gambling establishment. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired in 1952 on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark and his partner Frankie head to Tombstone, Arizona to find Doc Holliday with suspicion that Holliday is involved in the gang activity there. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Kim Spalding, Frank Richards, James Craven amd Harry Harvey. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Deputy Jeff Taggart is cheated in a horse deal. When the trader is found murdered, Jeff is the chief suspect. Judge Bean has to discover the actual murderer to save his friend from the gallows. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Judge Bean appoints himself as the legal guardian of a young man whose father was a member of an outlaw gang. Bean's reward -- the boy's uncle puts a $3000 bounty on his head ! Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: An editor of a newspaper is framed for murder. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A doll seems to cast a spell on Little Snowbird (Rochelle Goldstein). Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After shooting Luke Grayson in self-defense, Ben Cartwright must protect himself from Graysons son, Todd, who seeks to avenge his fathers death.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC.

programme.title: Down Texas Way
programme.desc: The sixth film in Monogram's Rough Rider series once again follows Buck Roberts (Buck Jones), Tom McCoy (Tim McCall), and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) as undercover US Marshals posing as outlaws in order to confound their enemies. When Sandy is framed for murder by a gang of frontier racketeers who hope to take over a small town as their headquarters, Buck and Tom must work separately to save their buddy from a lynch mob and foil the crook's dastardly schemes.

programme.title: The Yellow Rose of Texas
programme.desc: Fans of Roy Rogers and Dale Evans will relish this western adventure. It features no less than nine musical numbers! Songs include, The Timber Trail, Western Wonderland, Lucky Me, Unlucky You, Song of the Rover, and more. There's even a tune partly written by Cuban bandleader Xavier Cugat! In between songs, there's a plot about a robbery, with Roy playing an insurance investigator trying to solve the riddle of the missing money.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: Roy Rogers debuts in his starring role as the likable cowboy sent to Congress with a mission: let Washington know about the suffering of farmers in the wake of America's 1930s Dustbowl. Enjoy the singing cowboy in his first starring role, rubbing shoulder with politians, going up against greedy executives, and representing a whole people group you'll see why Rogers became a national icon! Frog Millhouse: Smiley Burnett. Elanore Fairbanks: Carol Hughes. John Fairbanks: Guy Usher. Plus music and singing from the Maple City Four. (The song Dust was nominated for an Academy Award!) Directed by Joe Kane.

programme.title: Northwest Trail
programme.desc: Mountie Matt OBrien assignment is simple: He is to escort the rather grouchy, and slightly annoying, Miss Katherine Owens to a remote outpost. Things complicate however when they arrive at the outpost and he stumbles upon an illegal mining operation. Stars include Bob Steele, Joan Woodbury, and Poodles Hanneford.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before it's too late.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: He Dared Death In The Outlaw's Lair! John Travers (John Wayne) takes on a mysterious gang leader known as The Shadow in this vintage western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Director/writer Robert N. Bradbury (Blue Steel, Riders of Destiny) gets the best of a remarkable cast that includes George Gabby Hayes. Of interest to film buffs is that the feature was shot in various California locations by Oscar winning cinematographer Archie Stout (The Quiet Man).

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: Kelnerzy
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds występuje w tej przezabawnej komedii o grupie kelnerów i kelnerek poszukujących sensu życia podczas oczekiwania na kolejny duży napiwek.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Cook Off!
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy, wraz z innymi geniuszami komedii, występuje w zabawnym mockumencie o zagorzałej walce w świecie konkursów cukierniczych.

programme.title: Podziemny krąg
programme.desc: Oparta na debiutanckiej powieści Chucka Palanhiuka historia o zagubionym młodym mężczyźnie z niedalekiej przyszłości. Nie mając rodziny ani przyjaciół, często odwiedza grupy wsparcia dla chorych w celu tworzenia więzi z innymi.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Przekleństwo Jeremy'ego
programme.desc: Nieśmiały i słabo rozwinięty młody człowiek o niesamowitych umiejętnościach uczy się radzenia sobie z życiem w małym skorumpowanym mieście.

programme.title: Król niewiernych
programme.desc: Młody chłopak chce ocalić swoje państwo przed okrutnymi najeźdźcami.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Człowiek niedźwiedź
programme.desc: W tym pasjonującym filmie dokumentalnym znany reżyser, Werner Herzog, opowiada o życiu i śmierci badacza-amatora niedźwiedzi grizzly i obrońcy przyrody, Timothy'ego Treadwella, który 13 lat spędził, bez broni, pośród tych niedźwiedzi.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Tajemnice Los Angeles
programme.desc: Trzech detektywów Jack Vincennes (Kevin Spacey), Bud White (Russell Crowe) oraz Ed Exley (Guy Pearce) łączą swoje siły, aby rozwiązać zagadkę seryjnych morderstw popełnionych przez gang. Otacza ich zarówno prestiżowa, jak i mroczna strona przemysłu filmowego.

programme.title: Destrukcja: Los Angeles (Destruction: Los Angeles)
programme.desc: Siejąca śmierć eksplozja wulkanu i największe trzęsienie ziemi w Los Angeles niszczy całe miasto i dziesiątkuje jego populację. Najlepszy lokalny reporter John Benson wykorzystuje szansę, by opowiedzieć historię miasta od wewnątrz, starając się znaleźć rodzinę zagubioną w chaosie.

programme.title: W zasięgu strzału
programme.desc: Liberty, żona producenta broni, zostaje porwana przez mężczyznę imieniem Joe. Celem Joego jest pomścić córkę, która zginęła w strzelaninie w szkole, a za winnych tej tragedii uznaje twórców broni użytej w tym celu.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Odrobina nieba
programme.desc: Marley jest piękna, młoda i odnosi sukcesy na każdym polu, oprócz spraw sercowych. Jej podejście do życia ulega zmianie, gdy wychodzi na jaw, że ma raka.

programme.title: Zostań
programme.desc: Pacjent ze skłonnościami samobójczymi głosi dziwaczne przepowiednie, które – ku rosnącemu przerażeniu jego psychiatry – zaczynają się spełniać. Lekarz rozpoczyna wyścig z czasem, aby uratować to, co kocha, zanim wszystko zniknie.

programme.title: Pajac za burtą
programme.desc: Młody komik, któremu się nie wiedzie, podejmuje się pracy fizycznej na wycieczkowcu, gdzie ma nadzieję złapać wiatr w żagle i zrobić karierę w przemyśle rozrywkowym.

programme.title: Bodom
programme.desc: Czwórka nastolatków wybiera się nad jezioro Bodom, by odtworzyć scenę brutalnego morderstwa sprzed lat.

programme.title: Angol
programme.desc: Wyjątkowo porywczy i niebezpieczny Anglik wychodzi z więzienia po latach odsiadki i wyrusza do Los Angeles, by odnaleźć człowieka, którego obwinia za śmierć córki.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: Destrukcja: Los Angeles (Destruction: Los Angeles)

programme.title: Wszystkie kobiety Mateusza
programme.desc: Mateusz Kłos jest artystą, hulaką i wielbicielem płci pięknej. Po swojej śmierci odwiedza w snach wszystkie kobiety, z którymi miał romans, co niepokoi ich mężów.

programme.title: Przekleństwo Jeremy'ego
programme.desc: Nieśmiały i słabo rozwinięty młody człowiek o niesamowitych umiejętnościach uczy się radzenia sobie z życiem w małym skorumpowanym mieście.

programme.title: Counterattack
programme.desc: Elitarny najemnik ucieka do dżungli po tym, jak został wrobiony w zabójstwo potentata naftowego. Towarzyszy mu reporterka, która ma dowód jego niewinności.

programme.title: Cook Off!
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy, wraz z innymi geniuszami komedii, występuje w zabawnym mockumencie o zagorzałej walce w świecie konkursów cukierniczych.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.
